all-furniture.Name: Lollipop Locker - Soft White
all-furniture.Body:
The perfect storage solution, our brand new Lollipop Locker is at home in your home or office to serve as a versatile storage solution for clothes, kitchen ware, books, equipment and much more. 

Versatility is the name of the game for this stylish new locker with a wide range of customization options meaning you can tailor it to your needs. It features 4 adjustable shelves, a hanging rail as well as cable routing gaps with each of these features adding a new layer of versatility to this piece.

The Locker also features a lock with a matching Popstrukt key ring. As well as adjustable feet so it can be placed on uneven surfaces.

Whether you're looking for a simple and stylish storage solution for your kitchen, bedroom, home office or workspace the Lollipop Locker is designed to fit your needs.

all-furniture.Name: Sugar Cube Side Table - Carbon Grey
all-furniture.Body:
!!! NOW ON PRE ORDER, ARRIVING EARLY JULY 2023 !!!

The Sugar Cube Side Table is a simple and elegant solution for a wide range of uses around the home. Whether it's a side table in the lounge, a bedside table for the bedroom or an under desk storage cabinet for your home office - you should have no problem finding a use for this versatile piece in your home.

It's packed full of customization features, which allow it to be tailored to your space. These include adjustable shelving for more varied storage options; integrated cable routing allowing electronic items to be placed inside the unit; and a reversible door, which means the cabinet can go on either side of the bed if used as a bedside table.

all-furniture.Name: Bon Bon Chest of Drawers - Soft White
all-furniture.Body:
The Bon-Bon Chest of Drawers combines minimalist style with practicality. This versatile unit functions beautifully as a chest of drawers for your bedroom, children's room or lounge or alternatively can be used as a storage unit in your kitchen, home office or workshop.

The Bon-Bon Chest of Drawers is made with 40% thicker steel and features robust, smooth rails for easy opening and closing of drawers. The unit is also much simpler to assemble.

With a hard-wearing powder coated finish and sturdy construction, this versatile unit is made to last.

all-furniture.Name: Nougat Storage Cabinet - Soft White
all-furniture.Body:
!!! NOW ON PRE ORDER, ARRIVING EARLY JULY 2023 !!!

The Nougat Storage Unit is the latest addition to our range of steel flatpack furniture. This piece is designed to offer a versatile storage solution with adjustable shelves allowing you to switch the layout to your personal needs.

Our Nougat Storage Unit features 40% thicker steel making them more robust than ever. Each unit is lockable and comes with keys and matching Popstrukt key ring. The units also feature handles and a cable routing hole in case your stored items require power.

What's better than a Lollipop Locker? Well what about one with twice the space. Our new Double Lockers bring all of the features of our Lollipop Lockers into a new plus sized solution.

all-furniture.Name: Top Deck Storage Cabinet - Moon Rock
all-furniture.Body:
The newest Popstrukt Storage Unit is here! Our new Top Deck range, features two separate storage areas with adjustable shelving and large doors making for easy storage and even easier access. This is a great piece for any space where you want to reduce clutter.

Use it to store linen, boardgames, tools, or as a modern alternative to a filing cabinet. If you've got something that needs putting away, then this unit is perfect for you. 

As with all our furniture the Top Deck is made with powder coated steel and features a durable construction, cable routing for electronics and comes with matching handles. It also features two sets of keys making it the perfect solution for an office or workshop where multiple people may need access.

all-furniture.Name: Wafer Shelf Tall - Dark Sand
all-furniture.Body:
With adjustable shelving and the ability to be connected to either the tall or wide wafer shelving units, the wafer shelf is the perfect modular solution for just about any room in your home. Configure it as bookcase, a display unit, remove the backing to let your wall show through*, the only limit is your design imagination. 

The Wafer Shelf Tall is constructed from durable powder coated steel and features integrated cable routing, adjustable shelving get yours today.

* Backing included.

birch-ply-tops.Name: Wooden Top - Sugar Cube Side Table
birch-ply-tops.Body:
9mm Birch Ply Top for the Sugar Cube side tables when a more durable surface is required. Features silicone feet to protect the top of your unit and prevent the unit from moving around. 

Birch ply (plywood) is a type of plywood made by layering thin layers of solid Birch wood in alternating directions to create a strong and durable panel. At Popstrukt we make use of sustainably sourced Scandinavian Birch ply to complement and extend the lifetime of our products.

Our Birch ply top add-ons is recommended for high use areas that see a lot of wear and tear.

Recently we've implemented some upgrades to our Birch top range for a more durable and complimentary finish. In addition to new packaging, we've also added more durable, non-slip feet to allow for seamless, hardwearing use.

 *Note: As Birch ply is a natural product and is prone to change colour over time. We quite like the contrast this adds to our steel range and hope it can breathe new life into your existing piece or new purchase from Popstrukt. Clean with damp cloth only.

*Top only. Sugar Cube Side Table not included. 

ADDS 5-10 WORKING DAYS TO ORDER IF OUT OF STOCK BUT WE TRY TO STAY STOCKED UP.

bubblegum-wall-hooks.Name: Bubblegum Wall Hook - Orchid Haze
bubblegum-wall-hooks.Body:
Our new Butter Bubblegum Wall Hook is here. These minimalist pieces are the perfect way to declutter your life by adding hanging space to any wall in your space.

These hooks feature two steel tongues, which offers double the hanging space while still being sleek and unobtrusive.

The hooks are made from tough powder coated steel, making them ultra durable and able to hang anything from hats to coats or even plants without bending or losing rigidity over time.

The best part of the Bubblegum Wall Hook is the easy installation, which can be done in minutes with only a few tools and minimal DIY knowledge.

components-add-ons.Name: Wooden Top - Sugar Cube Side Table
components-add-ons.Body:
9mm Birch Ply Top for the Sugar Cube side tables when a more durable surface is required. Features silicone feet to protect the top of your unit and prevent the unit from moving around. 

Birch ply (plywood) is a type of plywood made by layering thin layers of solid Birch wood in alternating directions to create a strong and durable panel. At Popstrukt we make use of sustainably sourced Scandinavian Birch ply to complement and extend the lifetime of our products.

Our Birch ply top add-ons is recommended for high use areas that see a lot of wear and tear.

Recently we've implemented some upgrades to our Birch top range for a more durable and complimentary finish. In addition to new packaging, we've also added more durable, non-slip feet to allow for seamless, hardwearing use.

 *Note: As Birch ply is a natural product and is prone to change colour over time. We quite like the contrast this adds to our steel range and hope it can breathe new life into your existing piece or new purchase from Popstrukt. Clean with damp cloth only.

*Top only. Sugar Cube Side Table not included. 

ADDS 5-10 WORKING DAYS TO ORDER IF OUT OF STOCK BUT WE TRY TO STAY STOCKED UP.

components-add-ons.Name: Wooden Top - Popcorn Media Unit
components-add-ons.Body:
9mm Birch Ply Top for the Popcorn Media Unit when a more durable surface is required. Features silicone feet to hold the top in place.

Birch ply (plywood) is a type of plywood made by layering thin layers of solid Birch wood in alternating directions to create a strong and durable panel. At Popstrukt we make use of sustainably sourced Scandinavian Birch ply to complement and extend the lifetime of our products.

Our Birch ply top add-ons is recommended for high use areas that see a lot of wear and tear.

Recently we've implemented some upgrades to our Birch top range for a more durable and complimentary finish. In addition to new packaging, we've also added more durable, non-slip feet to allow for seamless, hardwearing use.

 *Note: As Birch ply is a natural product and is prone to change colour over time. We quite like the contrast this adds to our steel range and hope it can breathe new life into your existing piece or new purchase from Popstrukt. Clean with damp cloth only.

*Top only. Popcorn Media Unit not included. 

ADDS 5-10 WORKING DAYS TO ORDER IF OUT OF STOCK BUT WE TRY TO STAY STOCKED UP.

dark-olive.Name: Lollipop Locker - Dark Olive
dark-olive.Body:
The perfect storage solution, our brand new Lollipop Locker is at home in your home or office to serve as a versatile storage solution for clothes, kitchen ware, books, equipment and much more. 

Versatility is the name of the game for this stylish new locker with a wide range of customization options meaning you can tailor it to your needs. It features 4 adjustable shelves, a hanging rail as well as cable routing gaps with each of these features adding a new layer of versatility to this piece.

The Locker also features a lock with a matching Popstrukt key ring. As well as adjustable feet so it can be placed on uneven surfaces.

Whether you're looking for a simple and stylish storage solution for your kitchen, bedroom, home office or workspace the Lollipop Locker is designed to fit your needs.

dark-olive.Name: Popcorn Media Unit - Dark Olive
dark-olive.Body: The Popcorn Media Unit is a fun and funky cabinet with a wide range of applications. While designed for the living room, this versatile piece also makes the perfect sideboard or storage cabinet for the home or office. The Popcorn comes with a variety of new features such as adjustable shelving, which allows the internal storage to be tailored to your needs. The piece also features locks on both doors as well as matching handles for easy opening and closing. It's a stylish modern solution for your lounge, bedroom, home office or workshop.

dark-olive.Name: Lollipop Locker Double - Dark Olive
dark-olive.Body:
What's better than a Lollipop Locker? Well what about one with twice the space. Our new Double Lockers bring all of the features of our Lollipop Lockers into a new plus sized solution. 

The locker features two lockable doors, adjustable shelving, a tough steel construction, cable routing holes and more. It's the perfect storage solution for the home, office or workshop, as its versatility make it ideal for a number of uses from a clothing cupboard to a filing cabinet.

dark-olive.Name: Sugar Cube Side Table - Dark Olive
dark-olive.Body:
The Sugar Cube Side Table is a simple and elegant solution for a wide range of uses around the home. Whether it's a side table in the lounge, a bedside table for the bedroom or an under desk storage cabinet for your home office - you should have no problem finding a use for this versatile piece in your home.

It's packed full of customization features, which allow it to be tailored to your space. These include adjustable shelving for more varied storage options; integrated cable routing allowing electronic items to be placed inside the unit; and a reversible door, which means the cabinet can go on either side of the bed if used as a bedside table.

dark-sand.Name: Wafer Shelf Wide - Dark Sand
dark-sand.Body:
A steel shelving unit with adjustable shelf height and connectors to join units together the Wafer shelving unit is available in ivory sand and dark sand colourways.

The unit is constructed from powder coated steel and has built in cable routing for electronics. 

The wafer shelving units can be used with or without backing.*

Dimensions (in mm): 1000W x 350D x 900H

* Backing included.

dark-sand.Name: Wafer Shelf Tall - Dark Sand
dark-sand.Body:
With adjustable shelving and the ability to be connected to either the tall or wide wafer shelving units, the wafer shelf is the perfect modular solution for just about any room in your home. Configure it as bookcase, a display unit, remove the backing to let your wall show through*, the only limit is your design imagination. 

The Wafer Shelf Tall is constructed from durable powder coated steel and features integrated cable routing, adjustable shelving get yours today.

* Backing included.

everything-on-the-site.Name: Top Deck Storage Cabinet - Moon Rock
everything-on-the-site.Body:

Use it to store linen, boardgames, tools, or as a modern alternative to a filing cabinet. If you've got something that needs putting away, then this unit is perfect for you.

It also features two sets of keys making it the perfect solution for an office or workshop where multiple people may need access.

everything-on-the-site.Name: Bubblegum Wall Hook - Butter
everything-on-the-site.Body:
Our new Butter Bubblegum Wall Hook is here. These minimalist pieces are the perfect way to declutter your life by adding hanging space to any wall in your space.

These hooks feature two steel tongues, which offers double the hanging space while still being sleek and unobtrusive.

The hooks are made from tough powder coated steel, making them ultra durable and able to hang anything from hats to coats or even plants without bending or losing rigidity over time.

The best part of the Bubblegum Wall Hook is the easy installation, which can be done in minutes with only a few tools and minimal DIY knowledge.

Our Nougat Storage Unit features 40% thicker steel making them more robust than ever. Each unit is lockable and comes with keys and matching Popstrukt key ring. The units also feature handles and a cable routing hole in case your stored items require power.

everything-on-the-site.Name: Bubblegum Wall Hook - Forest Green
everything-on-the-site.Body:

These hooks feature two steel tongues, which offers double the hanging space while still being sleek and unobtrusive.

The hooks are made from tough powder coated steel, making them ultra durable and able to hang anything from hats to coats or even plants without bending or losing rigidity over time.

The best part of the Bubblegum Wall Hook is the easy installation, which can be done in minutes with only a few tools and minimal DIY knowledge.

everything-on-the-site.Name: Sugar Cube Side Table - Terra
everything-on-the-site.Body:
The Sugar Cube Side Table is a simple and elegant solution for a wide range of uses around the home. Whether it's a side table in the lounge, a bedside table for the bedroom or an under desk storage cabinet for your home office - you should have no problem finding a use for this versatile piece in your home.

It's packed full of customization features, which allow it to be tailored to your space. These include adjustable shelving for more varied storage options; integrated cable routing allowing electronic items to be placed inside the unit; and a reversible door, which means the cabinet can go on either side of the bed if used as a bedside table.

everything-on-the-site.Name: Wooden Top - Nougat Storage Cabinet
everything-on-the-site.Body:
9mm Birch Ply Top for the Nougat Storage Unit when a more durable surface is required. Features silicone feet to protect the top of your unit and prevent the component from moving around. 

Birch ply (plywood) is a type of plywood made by layering thin layers of solid Birch wood in alternating directions to create a strong and durable panel. At Popstrukt we make use of sustainably sourced Scandinavian Birch ply to complement and extend the lifetime of our products.

Our Birch ply top add-ons is recommended for high use areas that see a lot of wear and tear.

Recently we've implemented some upgrades to our Birch top range for a more durable and complimentary finish. In addition to new packaging, we've also added more durable, non-slip feet to allow for seamless, hardwearing use.

 *Note: As Birch ply is a natural product and is prone to change colour over time. We quite like the contrast this adds to our steel range and hope it can breathe new life into your existing piece or new purchase from Popstrukt. Clean with damp cloth only.

*TOP ONLY, NOUGAT STORAGE UNIT NOT INCLUDED.

ADDS 5-10 WORKING DAYS TO ORDER IF OUT OF STOCK BUT WE TRY TO STAY STOCKED UP.

everything-on-the-site.Name: Top Deck Storage Cabinet - Honey
everything-on-the-site.Body:
The newest Popstrukt Storage Unit is here! Our new Top Deck range, features two separate storage areas with adjustable shelving and large doors making for easy storage and even easier access. This is a great piece for any space where you want to reduce clutter.

Use it to store linen, boardgames, tools, or as a modern alternative to a filing cabinet. If you've got something that needs putting away, then this unit is perfect for you. 

As with all our furniture the Top Deck is made with powder coated steel and features a durable construction, cable routing for electronics and comes with matching handles. It also features two sets of keys making it the perfect solution for an office or workshop where multiple people may need access.

Versatility is the name of the game for this stylish new locker with a wide range of customization options meaning you can tailor it to your needs. homeware-accessories.Name: Bubblegum Wall Hook - Butter
homeware-accessories.Body:
Our new Butter Bubblegum Wall Hook is here. These minimalist pieces are the perfect way to declutter your life by adding hanging space to any wall in your space.

These hooks feature two steel tongues, which offers double the hanging space while still being sleek and unobtrusive.

The hooks are made from tough powder coated steel, making them ultra durable and able to hang anything from hats to coats or even plants without bending or losing rigidity over time.

The best part of the Bubblegum Wall Hook is the easy installation, which can be done in minutes with only a few tools and minimal DIY knowledge.

The Sugar Cube Side Table is a simple and elegant solution for a wide range of uses around the home. Whether it's a side table in the lounge, a bedside table for the bedroom or an under desk storage cabinet for your home office - you should have no problem finding a use for this versatile piece in your home.

It's packed full of customization features, which allow it to be tailored to your space. These include adjustable shelving for more varied storage options; integrated cable routing allowing electronic items to be placed inside the unit; and a reversible door, which means the cabinet can go on either side of the bed if used as a bedside table.

kids-room.Name: Lollipop Locker - Blush
kids-room.Body:
The perfect storage solution, our brand new Lollipop Locker is at home in your home or office to serve as a versatile storage solution for clothes, kitchen ware, books, equipment and much more. 

Versatility is the name of the game for this stylish new locker with a wide range of customization options meaning you can tailor it to your needs. It features 4 adjustable shelves, a hanging rail as well as cable routing gaps with each of these features adding a new layer of versatility to this piece.

The Locker also features a lock with a matching Popstrukt key ring. As well as adjustable feet so it can be placed on uneven surfaces.

Whether you're looking for a simple and stylish storage solution for your kitchen, bedroom, home office or workspace the Lollipop Locker is designed to fit your needs.

kids-room.Name: Lollipop Locker Double - Soft White
kids-room.Body:
What's better than a Lollipop Locker? Well what about one with twice the space. Our new Double Lockers bring all of the features of our Lollipop Lockers into a new plus sized solution. 

The locker features two lockable doors, adjustable shelving, a tough steel construction, cable routing holes and more. It's the perfect storage solution for the home, office or workshop, as its versatility make it ideal for a number of uses from a clothing cupboard to a filing cabinet.

kids-room.Name: Bon Bon Chest of Drawers - Carbon Grey
kids-room.Body:
The Bon-Bon Chest of Drawers combines minimalist style with practicality. This versatile unit functions beautifully as a chest of drawers for your bedroom, children's room or lounge or alternatively can be used as a storage unit in your kitchen, home office or workshop.

The Bon-Bon Chest of Drawers is made with 40% thicker steel and features robust, smooth rails for easy opening and closing of drawers. The unit is also much simpler to assemble.

With a hard-wearing powder coated finish and sturdy construction, this versatile unit is made to last.

live-popstrukt-ida-elsje.Body:
The Nougat Storage Unit is the latest addition to our range of steel flatpack furniture. This piece is designed to offer a versatile storage solution with adjustable shelves allowing you to switch the layout to your personal needs.

Our Nougat Storage Unit features 40% thicker steel making them more robust than ever. Each unit is lockable and comes with keys and matching Popstrukt key ring. The units also feature handles and a cable routing hole in case your stored items require power.

live-popstrukt-ida-elsje.Name: Popcorn Media Unit - Blush
live-popstrukt-ida-elsje.Body:
The Popcorn Media Unit is a fun and funky cabinet with a wide range of applications. While designed for the living room, this versatile piece also makes the perfect sideboard or storage cabinet for the home or office.
 
The Popcorn comes with a variety of new features such as adjustable shelving, which allows the internal storage to be tailored to your needs. The piece also features locks on both doors as well as matching handles for easy opening and closing.

It's a stylish modern solution for your lounge, bedroom, home office or workshop.

live-popstrukt-ida-elsje.Body:

Made from powder coated steel the Bon Bon is durable and the drawers feature robust, smooth rails for easy opening and closing.

Dimensions (in mm): 450W x 400D x 730H

live-popstrukt-ida-elsje.Name: Top Deck Storage Cabinet - Moon Rock
live-popstrukt-ida-elsje.Body:
The newest Popstrukt Storage Unit is here! Our new Top Deck range, features two separate storage areas with adjustable shelving and large doors making for easy storage and even easier access. This is a great piece for any space where you want to reduce clutter.

Use it to store linen, boardgames, tools, or as a modern alternative to a filing cabinet. If you've got something that needs putting away, then this unit is perfect for you. 

As with all our furniture the Top Deck is made with powder coated steel and features a durable construction, cable routing for electronics and comes with matching handles. It also features two sets of keys making it the perfect solution for an office or workshop where multiple people may need access.

The Nougat Storage Unit is the latest addition to our range of steel flatpack furniture. This piece is designed to offer a versatile storage solution with adjustable shelves allowing you to switch the layout to your personal needs.

Our Nougat Storage Unit features 40% thicker steel making them more robust than ever. Each unit is lockable and comes with keys and matching Popstrukt key ring. The units also feature handles and a cable routing hole in case your stored items require power.

lockers.Name: Lollipop Locker - Dark Olive
lockers.Body:
The perfect storage solution, our brand new Lollipop Locker is at home in your home or office to serve as a versatile storage solution for clothes, kitchen ware, books, equipment and much more. 

Versatility is the name of the game for this stylish new locker with a wide range of customization options meaning you can tailor it to your needs. It features 4 adjustable shelves, a hanging rail as well as cable routing gaps with each of these features adding a new layer of versatility to this piece.

The Locker also features a lock with a matching Popstrukt key ring. As well as adjustable feet so it can be placed on uneven surfaces.

Whether you're looking for a simple and stylish storage solution for your kitchen, bedroom, home office or workspace the Lollipop Locker is designed to fit your needs.

lockers.Name: Lollipop Locker Double - Soft White
lockers.Body:
What's better than a Lollipop Locker? Well what about one with twice the space. Our new Double Lockers bring all of the features of our Lollipop Lockers into a new plus sized solution. 

The locker features two lockable doors, adjustable shelving, a tough steel construction, cable routing holes and more. It's the perfect storage solution for the home, office or workshop, as its versatility make it ideal for a number of uses from a clothing cupboard to a filing cabinet.

lockers.Name: Top Deck Storage Cabinet - Moon Rock
lockers.Body:
The newest Popstrukt Storage Unit is here! Our new Top Deck range, features two separate storage areas with adjustable shelving and large doors making for easy storage and even easier access. This is a great piece for any space where you want to reduce clutter.

Use it to store linen, boardgames, tools, or as a modern alternative to a filing cabinet. If you've got something that needs putting away, then this unit is perfect for you. 

As with all our furniture the Top Deck is made with powder coated steel and features a durable construction, cable routing for electronics and comes with matching handles. It also features two sets of keys making it the perfect solution for an office or workshop where multiple people may need access.

media-units.Name: Popcorn Media Unit - Dark Olive
media-units.Body: The Popcorn Media Unit is a fun and funky cabinet with a wide range of applications. While designed for the living room, this versatile piece also makes the perfect sideboard or storage cabinet for the home or office. The Popcorn comes with a variety of new features such as adjustable shelving, which allows the internal storage to be tailored to your needs. The piece also features locks on both doors as well as matching handles for easy opening and closing. It's a stylish modern solution for your lounge, bedroom, home office or workshop.

media-units.Name: Bon Bon Sideboard - Silk Grey
media-units.Body:
The Bon Bon range is expanding and the newest addition is the Bon Bon Sideboard. This versatile piece can be used as a media unit, storage unit or sideboard. The clean minimalist design brings a modern sophistication to any space.

The Bon Bon features sliding drawers, which offer excellent storage material.

moon-rock.Body:
The newest Popstrukt Storage Unit is here! Our new Top Deck range, features two separate storage areas with adjustable shelving and large doors making for easy storage and even easier access. This is a great piece for any space where you want to reduce clutter.

Use it to store linen, boardgames, tools, or as a modern alternative to a filing cabinet. If you've got something that needs putting away, then this unit is perfect for you. 

As with all our furniture the Top Deck is made with powder coated steel and features a durable construction, cable routing for electronics and comes with matching handles. It also features two sets of keys making it the perfect solution for an office or workshop where multiple people may need access.

moss-grey.Name: Bon Bon Chest of Drawers - Moss Grey
moss-grey.Body:
The Bon-Bon Chest of Drawers combines minimalist style with practicality. This versatile unit functions beautifully as a chest of drawers for your bedroom, children's room or lounge or alternatively can be used as a storage unit in your kitchen, home office or workshop.

The Bon-Bon Chest of Drawers is made with 40% thicker steel and features robust, smooth rails for easy opening and closing of drawers. The unit is also much simpler to assemble.

With a hard-wearing powder coated finish and sturdy construction, this versatile unit is made to last.

moss-grey.Name: Bon Bon Sideboard - Moss Grey
moss-grey.Body:

The Bon Bon features sliding drawers, which offer excellent storage material.

moss-grey.Name: Bon Bon Side Table - Moss Grey
moss-grey.Body:
The newest addition to our Bon Bon range, this side table provides compact storage with a sleek, modern design and finishes. This makes it perfect for a wide range of uses around the home from a set of bedside tables to a under desk storage solution for your home office.

Made from powder coated steel the Bon Bon is durable and the drawers feature robust, smooth rails for easy opening and closing.

new.Name: Sugar Cube Side Table - Terra
new.Body:
The Sugar Cube Side Table is a simple and elegant solution for a wide range of uses around the home. Whether it's a side table in the lounge, a bedside table for the bedroom or an under desk storage cabinet for your home office - you should have no problem finding a use for this versatile piece in your home.

It's packed full of customization features, which allow it to be tailored to your space. These include adjustable shelving for more varied storage options; integrated cable routing allowing electronic items to be placed inside the unit; and a reversible door, which means the cabinet can go on either side of the bed if used as a bedside table.

new-releases.Body:

Configure it as bookcase, a display unit, remove the backing to let your wall show through*, the only limit is your design imagination. 

The Wafer Shelf Tall is constructed from durable powder coated steel and features integrated cable routing, adjustable shelving get yours today.

* Backing included.

The newest addition to our Bon Bon range, this side table provides compact storage with a sleek, modern design and finishes. This makes it perfect for a wide range of uses around the home from a set of bedside tables to a under desk storage solution for your home office.

Made from powder coated steel the Bon Bon is durable and the drawers feature robust, smooth rails for easy opening and closing.

office.Name: Popcorn Media Unit - Blush
office.Body:
The Popcorn Media Unit is a fun and funky cabinet with a wide range of applications. While designed for the living room, this versatile piece also makes the perfect sideboard or storage cabinet for the home or office.
 
The Popcorn comes with a variety of new features such as adjustable shelving, which allows the internal storage to be tailored to your needs. The piece also features locks on both doors as well as matching handles for easy opening and closing.

It's a stylish modern solution for your lounge, bedroom, home office or workshop.

office.Name: Sugar Cube Side Table - Reed Green
office.Body:
The Sugar Cube Side Table is a simple and elegant solution for a wide range of uses around the home. Whether it's a side table in the lounge, a bedside table for the bedroom or an under desk storage cabinet for your home office - you should have no problem finding a use for this versatile piece in your home.

It's packed full of customization features, which allow it to be tailored to your space. These include adjustable shelving for more varied storage options; integrated cable routing allowing electronic items to be placed inside the unit; and a reversible door, which means the cabinet can go on either side of the bed if used as a bedside table.

shelves.Name: Wafer Shelf Wide - Dark Sand
shelves.Body:
A steel shelving unit with adjustable shelf height and connectors to join units together the Wafer shelving unit is available in ivory sand and dark sand colourways.

The unit is constructed from powder coated steel and has built in cable routing for electronics. 

The wafer shelving units can be used with or without backing.*

Dimensions (in mm): 1000W x 350D x 900H

* Backing included.

shelves.Name: Wafer Shelf Tall - Dark Sand
shelves.Body:
With adjustable shelving and the ability to be connected to either the tall or wide wafer shelving units, the wafer shelf is the perfect modular solution for just about any room in your home. Configure it as bookcase, a display unit, remove the backing to let your wall show through*, the only limit is your design imagination. 

The Wafer Shelf Tall is constructed from durable powder coated steel and features integrated cable routing, adjustable shelving get yours today.

* Backing included.

shineshine-selection.Name: Top Deck Storage Cabinet - Moon Rock
shineshine-selection.Body:
The newest Popstrukt Storage Unit is here! Our new Top Deck range, features two separate storage areas with adjustable shelving and large doors making for easy storage and even easier access. This is a great piece for any space where you want to reduce clutter.

Use it to store linen, boardgames, tools, or as a modern alternative to a filing cabinet. If you've got something that needs putting away, then this unit is perfect for you. 

As with all our furniture the Top Deck is made with powder coated steel and features a durable construction, cable routing for electronics and comes with matching handles. It also features two sets of keys making it the perfect solution for an office or workshop where multiple people may need access.

storage-solutions.Name: Wooden Top - Popcorn Media Unit
storage-solutions.Body:
9mm Birch Ply Top for the Popcorn Media Unit when a more durable surface is required. Features silicone feet to hold the top in place.

Birch ply (plywood) is a type of plywood made by layering thin layers of solid Birch wood in alternating directions to create a strong and durable panel. At Popstrukt we make use of sustainably sourced Scandinavian Birch ply to complement and extend the lifetime of our products.

Our Birch ply top add-ons is recommended for high use areas that see a lot of wear and tear.

Recently we've implemented some upgrades to our Birch top range for a more durable and complimentary finish. In addition to new packaging, we've also added more durable, non-slip feet to allow for seamless, hardwearing use.

 *Note: As Birch ply is a natural product and is prone to change colour over time. We quite like the contrast this adds to our steel range and hope it can breathe new life into your existing piece or new purchase from Popstrukt. Clean with damp cloth only.

*Top only. Popcorn Media Unit not included. 

ADDS 5-10 WORKING DAYS TO ORDER IF OUT OF STOCK BUT WE TRY TO STAY STOCKED UP.

The Sugar Cube Side Table is a simple and elegant solution for a wide range of uses around the home. Whether it's a side table in the lounge, a bedside table for the bedroom or an under desk storage cabinet for your home office - you should have no problem finding a use for this versatile piece in your home.

It's packed full of customization features, which allow it to be tailored to your space. These include adjustable shelving for more varied storage options; integrated cable routing allowing electronic items to be placed inside the unit; and a reversible door, which means the cabinet can go on either side of the bed if used as a bedside table.

storage-units.Name: Lollipop Locker - Carbon Grey
storage-units.Body: The perfect storage solution, our Lollipop Locker is at home in your home or office to serve as a versatile storage solution for clothes, kitchen ware, books, equipment and much more. Versatility is the name of the game for this stylish new locker with a wide range of customization options meaning you can tailor it to your needs. It features 4 adjustable shelves, a hanging rail as well as cable routing gaps with each of these features adding a new layer of versatility to this piece. The Locker also features a lock with a matching Popstrukt key ring. As well as adjustable feet so it can be placed on uneven surfaces. Whether you're looking for a simple and stylish storage solution for your kitchen, bedroom, home office or workspace the Lollipop Locker is designed to fit your needs.

storage-units.Name: Popcorn Media Unit - Blush
storage-units.Body:
The Popcorn Media Unit is a fun and funky cabinet with a wide range of applications. While designed for the living room, this versatile piece also makes the perfect sideboard or storage cabinet for the home or office.
 
The Popcorn comes with a variety of new features such as adjustable shelving, which allows the internal storage to be tailored to your needs. The piece also features locks on both doors as well as matching handles for easy opening and closing.

It's a stylish modern solution for your lounge, bedroom, home office or workshop.

storage-units.Name: Bon Bon Side Table - Soft White
storage-units.Body:
The newest addition to our Bon Bon range, this side table provides compact storage with a sleek, modern design and finishes. This makes it perfect for a wide range of uses around the home from a set of bedside tables to a under desk storage solution for your home office.

Made from powder coated steel the Bon Bon is durable and the drawers feature robust, smooth rails for easy opening and closing.

Dimensions (in mm): 450W x 400D x 730H

storage-units.Name: Bon Bon Sideboard - Moss Grey
storage-units.Body:
The Bon Bon range is expanding and the newest addition is the Bon Bon Sideboard. This versatile piece can be used as a media unit, storage unit or sideboard. The clean minimalist design brings a modern sophistication to any space.

The Bon Bon features sliding drawers, which offer excellent storage material.

storage-units.Name: Wafer Shelf Wide - Dark Sand
storage-units.Body:
A steel shelving unit with adjustable shelf height and connectors to join units together the Wafer shelving unit is available in ivory sand and dark sand colourways.

The unit is constructed from powder coated steel and has built in cable routing for electronics. 

The wafer shelving units can be used with or without backing.*

Dimensions (in mm): 1000W x 350D x 900H

* Backing included.

storage-units.Name: Top Deck Storage Cabinet - Moon Rock
storage-units.Body:
The newest Popstrukt Storage Unit is here! Our new Top Deck range, features two separate storage areas with adjustable shelving and large doors making for easy storage and even easier access. This is a great piece for any space where you want to reduce clutter.

Use it to store linen, boardgames, tools, or as a modern alternative to a filing cabinet. If you've got something that needs putting away, then this unit is perfect for you. 

As with all our furniture the Top Deck is made with powder coated steel and features a durable construction, cable routing for electronics and comes with matching handles. It also features two sets of keys making it the perfect solution for an office or workshop where multiple people may need access.

storage-units.Name: Lollipop Locker - Honey
storage-units.Body:
!!! NOW ON PRE ORDER, ARRIVING EARLY JULY 2023 !!!

The perfect storage solution, our Lollipop Locker is at home in your home or office to serve as a versatile storage solution for clothes, kitchen ware, books, equipment and much more. 
 

Versatility is the name of the game for this stylish new locker with a wide range of customization options meaning you can tailor it to your needs. It features 4 adjustable shelves, a hanging rail as well as cable routing gaps with each of these features adding a new layer of versatility to this piece.

The Locker also features a lock with a matching Popstrukt key ring. As well as adjustable feet so it can be placed on uneven surfaces.

Whether you're looking for a simple and stylish storage solution for your kitchen, bedroom, home office or workspace the Lollipop Locker is designed to fit your needs.

storage-units.Name: Bon Bon Chest of Drawers - Carbon Grey
storage-units.Body:
The Bon-Bon Chest of Drawers combines minimalist style with practicality. This versatile unit functions beautifully as a chest of drawers for your bedroom, children's room or lounge or alternatively can be used as a storage unit in your kitchen, home office or workshop.

The Bon-Bon Chest of Drawers is made with 40% thicker steel and features robust, smooth rails for easy opening and closing of drawers. The unit is also much simpler to assemble.

With a hard-wearing powder coated finish and sturdy construction, this versatile unit is made to last.

storage-units.Name: Nougat Storage Cabinet - Pigeon Blue
storage-units.Body:
The Nougat Storage Unit is the latest addition to our range of steel flatpack furniture. This piece is designed to offer a versatile storage solution with adjustable shelves allowing you to switch the layout to your personal needs.

Our Nougat Storage Unit features 40% thicker steel making them more robust than ever. Each unit is lockable and comes with keys and matching Popstrukt key ring. The units also feature handles and a cable routing hole in case your stored items require power.

Whether it's a side table in the lounge, a bedside table for the bedroom or an under desk storage cabinet for your home office - you should have no problem finding a use for this versatile piece in your home.

It's packed full of customization features, which allow it to be tailored to your space. These include adjustable shelving for more varied storage options; integrated cable routing allowing electronic items to be placed inside the unit; and a reversible door, which means the cabinet can go on either side of the bed if used as a bedside table.

the-white-collection.Name: Lollipop Locker - Soft White
the-white-collection.Body:
The perfect storage solution, our brand new Lollipop Locker is at home in your home or office to serve as a versatile storage solution for clothes, kitchen ware, books, equipment and much more. 

Versatility is the name of the game for this stylish new locker with a wide range of customization options meaning you can tailor it to your needs. It features 4 adjustable shelves, a hanging rail as well as cable routing gaps with each of these features adding a new layer of versatility to this piece.

The Locker also features a lock with a matching Popstrukt key ring. As well as adjustable feet so it can be placed on uneven surfaces.

Whether you're looking for a simple and stylish storage solution for your kitchen, bedroom, home office or workspace the Lollipop Locker is designed to fit your needs.

wafer-shelves.Body:

The unit is constructed from powder coated steel and has built in cable routing for electronics. 

The wafer shelving units can be used with or without backing.*

Dimensions (in mm): 1000W x 350D x 900H

* Backing included.

wafer-shelves.Name: Wafer Shelf Tall - Dark Sand
wafer-shelves.Body:
With adjustable shelving and the ability to be connected to either the tall or wide wafer shelving units, the wafer shelf is the perfect modular solution for just about any room in your home. Configure it as bookcase, a display unit, remove the backing to let your wall show through*, the only limit is your design imagination. 

The Wafer Shelf Tall is constructed from durable powder coated steel and features integrated cable routing, adjustable shelving get yours today.

* Backing included.
